text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews @CNN @OANN @newsmax Remember when you said that, unlike Obama, you would be too busy to golf as president? The American People remember! Bunker Baby is losing in the polls. You care more about your image and conspiracy theories than you do about protecting our troops from Russia and COVID-19 victims
